Class RunDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.tzar.db.RunDao

  • public class RunDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle Run management, including loading and persisting to the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextRun

        public Run getNextRun(java.lang.String runset,
             java.lang.String clusterName)
               throws TzarException
        Polls the database for the next scheduled run. If a scheduled run is found, the run is marked as 'in_progress' and persisted to the database. This is done in a single transaction, to avoid two nodes from executing the same run.
        Parameters:
        runset - runset to filter by or null to poll for any runset
        clusterName - we only poll for runs scheduled for the current cluster. Not null, but may be empty.
        Returns:
        true if a run was found, false otherwise
        Throws:
        TzarException - if something goes wrong executing the run

      • markRunInProgress

        public boolean markRunInProgress(Run run)
                          throws TzarException
        Throws:
        TzarException

      • persistRun

        public void persistRun(Run run)
                throws TzarException
        Throws:
        TzarException

      • insertRuns

        public void insertRuns(java.util.List<? extends Run> runs)
                throws TzarException
        Inserts the provided runs into the database, including their parameters. Runs will be marked as 'scheduled'.
        Parameters:
        runs - runs to insert into the db
        Throws:
        TzarException - if an error occurs inserting the runs

      • printRuns

        public void printRuns(java.util.List<java.lang.String> states,
             java.lang.String hostname,
             java.lang.String runset,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> runIds,
             boolean truncateOutput,
             Utils.OutputType outputType)
               throws TzarException
        Prints the set of matching runs in the database to stdout.
        Parameters:
        states - list of states to be matched (using boolean OR) (may be empty or null)
        hostname - hostname to match, may be null.
        runset - runset to match, may be null
        runIds - list of run ids to match, may be null or empty
        truncateOutput - if the output should be truncated
        outputType - output format
        Throws:
        TzarException - if the runs cannot be loaded

      • getRuns

        public java.util.List<Run> getRuns(java.util.List<java.lang.String> states,

                          java.lang.String runset,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> runIds)
                            throws TzarException
        Throws:
